teaser: Airing on Friday, May 1, 2015: Marketplaces collaborates with FiveThirtyEight to look at the world of podcast advertising. Turns out that the majority of ads in today's podcasts are from mid-sized companies that sell online. Next: Tesla unveiled the Powerwall — a big battery for your home — on Thursday in California. The battery will operate by using energy that comes from your roof's solar panels.

byline: Robert Garrova, Kai Ryssdal, Scott Tong and Mitchell Hartman
title: Marketplace for Friday, May 1, 2015
